attachments.title: 67 Percent Project - Plus Size Women Body Image
attachments.text: Join us in changing the ratio with the 67% project. #Seethe67
attachments.fallback: 67 Percent Project - Plus Size Women Body Image

text: I might get some slack here, but it seems like thereâ€™s popular campaigns for women size 0-2, and then campaigns rebelling with size 14+. I kinda wish there were more campaigns with less extremes of the spectrum, or at the very least a mixture of all (Dove is decent with this).
I think that's the intent of the 67 campaign though, to expand the spectrum by explicitly highlighting an underserved demographic
That being said, saw this on wildfang <http://blog.wildfang.com/12-real-women-meet-perfect-suit/>
Oh I totally get that! And I love seeing the other end of the spectrum, just wish there was more captured in the middle.
